title: KirQ's Artwork Page
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

Hi guys (´；ω；｀) welcome to my artwork page.

I often draw animal SCP and stuffs like that. If you want me to draw anything, feel free to comment and i will try my best (p/s: I'm not a good artist ಥ‿ಥ).
----
+ Article in SCP Wiki.

+ Article in Vietnamese branch.
[[collapsible show="► SCP-014-VN - Dream Crayons™ by KirQ & StupifPotato" hide=" ▼ hide"]]

My younger brother drew this for my article in Vietnamese branch. Check out the [http://scp-int.wikidot.com/scp-014-vn translation]!, translated by [[*user Irina Bougainvillea]].

[[image http://scpdsandbox.wdfiles.com/local--files/collab%3Ascp-vn/Kir%20v%C3%A0%20b%C3%A1nh%20k%E1%BA%B9o width="500px"]]

And i will draw more in tha future, thank you for your attention! ༼ つ ◕_◕ ༽つ
author: KirQ
